parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting campaign finance.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Valeriu Iftime, the president of PNL Botoșani.  It directly promotes the PNL party and urges voters to vote for "Echipa Valeriu Iftime," clearly identifying a specific parliamentary candidate and party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience in Botoșani and surrounding counties, as evidenced by the `aaa_info` section specifying numerous cities and counties. This is not a private communication; it's designed for broad public reach.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voting for Valeriu Iftime and the PNL party in the parliamentary elections.  Phrases like "Avem nevoie de toată mobilizarea pentru alegerile parlamentare," "Doar alegând #EchipaValeriuIftime, echipa PNL, putem schimba ceva," and "Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot" explicitly aim to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. While it uses some language that might appear informative, its core purpose is not to provide objective news or analysis but to advocate for a specific candidate and party. The call to action ("ne vedem la vot") further reinforces its promotional nature.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly structured promotional message from a political entity, urging voters to support a specific candidate. The language used is persuasive and promotional, not reflective of a personal viewpoint.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>925633439092773</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a specific candidate (Valeriu Iftime) and party (PNL), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for PNL), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's timing is also crucial; even if the exact date isn't specified, the context strongly suggests it's related to the parliamentary elections.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Dorohoi, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 925633439092773) care constituie propagandă electorală pentru PNL și Valeriu Iftime,  cu scopul clar de a influența votul alegătorilor prin îndemnuri directe precum „Avem nevoie de toată mobilizarea pentru alegerile parlamentare”, „Doar alegând #EchipaValeriuIftime, echipa PNL, putem schimba ceva”, și „Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot”,  ignorând astfel restricțiile legale privind continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale.  Prezența numărului CMF 11240002 confirmă natura electorală a postării.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
